entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 a.m. MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
